meanings.sent1: The marshmallow was the squishiest thing I had ever touched.
meanings.sent2: The pillow felt squishiest when I squeezed it tightly.
meanings.sent3: The squishiest teddy bear seemed to enjoy being hugged the most.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the squishiest sponge, absorbing all the love around her.
meanings.sent5: The mud was so squishiest under my feet, making each step a delight.

meanings.sent1: The ripe tomato was the squishiest in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The stress ball was the squishiest of all the toys in the box.
meanings.sent3: The squishiest stress ball made the best sound when squeezed.
meanings.sent4: His cheeks were the squishiest, making them perfect for pinching.
meanings.sent5: The squishiest sponge soaked up the water in seconds, showing its absorbent power.
